--------------------------------------

System:
If you fall down you come in a
little minigame where you can
lose health points. [Pic. 2]
The map haven´t a timer. You
surf until one player beat the map.

Then you come in the endjail
and the winner can kill you or
he do nothing.
If he do nothing 64 platforms in
jail break random and you fall down
into dirty water and die, too.

--------------------------------------


[E]njoy[!]
